languages.text: "Вокруг тьма... и пламя... а тебе... уютно?!"
"We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"
languages.original_text: "Вокруг тьма... и пламя... а тебе... уютно?!"

traits.locale_text: "We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"
"We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"
"We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"
"We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"

languages.text: "Wir sind von Dunkelheit umgeben ... und Flammen ... und Ihr fühlt Euch ... gemütlich?"
languages.original_text: "We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind von Dunkelheit umgeben ... und Flammen ... und Ihr fühlt Euch ... gemütlich?"

languages.text: « Nous sommes cernés par les ténèbres... et les flammes... et vous vous sentez... dans votre élément ? »
languages.original_text: "We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes cernés par les ténèbres... et les flammes... et vous vous sentez... dans votre élément ? »

languages.text: «Nos rodean la oscuridad... y el fuego... y está... ¿a gusto?».
languages.original_text: "We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"

traits.locale_text: «Nos rodean la oscuridad... y el fuego... y está... ¿a gusto?».

languages.text: 「私達は闇に覆われている…炎にも…なのにあなたは…居心地がいいと言うの？」
languages.original_text: "We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"

traits.locale_text: 「私達は闇に覆われている…炎にも…なのにあなたは…居心地がいいと言うの？」

languages.text: “我们被黑暗与火焰……包围其中……而你却感到……很舒适？”
languages.original_text: "We're surrounded by darkness... and flames... and you're feeling... cosy?"

traits.locale_text: “我们被黑暗与火焰……包围其中……而你却感到……很舒适？”
